question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. parking meter
B. motorcycle
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The 2D image makes it ambiguous whether the motorcycle or the parking meter is further away, as both are relatively close to the camera and their depth relationship is not clearly distinguishable without a depth map.
